attributes.additional_details:
We herby ask the UK government to disclose details of Coronavirus related negotiations with the North Pole, ahead of Christmas. Specifically:

1) Will Santa be permitted to enter domestic dwellings via chimney (or alternative entry points)?

2) Will he be required to wear a face covering in addition to his beard and/or other PPE?

3) Or, will he be required to introduce a similar scheme to most couriers, where anticipating children can specify a safe place for him to leave the presents?

4) What does SAGE's model predict the infection rate (R) might be by New Year, if Santa is permitted to proceed without any agreed special measures on December 25th?
attributes.background: Disclose details of Coronavirus related negotiations with the North Pole, ahead of Christmas.

rejection.details:
The Government has already issued Covid-Secure guidance for businesses and workers.  You can find out more here:

https://www.gov.uk/guidance/working-safely-during-coronavirus-covid-19
